attributes.action: open Buckingham Palace to the homeless
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
An 80 year old woman does not need 775 rooms to herself. 
Move the Queen into sheltered accommodation and open up the palace to the homeless, and make the palace staff available to them. 

Alternatively, sell the crown jewels to pay for a purpose built centre for the homeless. 

When people are struggling more than ever to keep their heads above water, we cannot allow an old woman and her useless kids / grand kids and assorted hangers on to have free run of a 775 room building. 

Move the Royals out today and move the homeless in tomorrow. Some problems DO have simple answers.

The weather is cold, this needs to happen NOW.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
